snippet: Mr. Harvey, a British composer, was admired for his use of electronic sound in concert works and operas that could range from plainsonglike melody to elaborate orchestral textures.
abstract: Jonathan Harvey, British modernist composer who embraced electronic sound, dies at age 73.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Harvey, a British composer, was admired for his use of electronic sound in concert works and operas that could range from plainsonglike melody to elaborate orchestral textures.

headline.seo: Jonathan Harvey, Modernist Composer, Is Dead at 73
headline.main: Jonathan Harvey, Modernist Composer, Dies at 73
